test.create_query: CREATE TABLE str_sort (a String, b UInt64, c FixedString(5), d String, e UInt32, f UInt32) ENGINE = Memory
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO str_sort SELECT randomString(4) AS a, rand() AS b, cast(randomString(5) AS FixedString(5)) as c, toString(rand() % 100000) as d, rand() % 1000 as e, rand() % 1000 as f FROM numbers(1e7)
test.query: SELECT a, b FROM str_sort ORDER BY a, b, e, f FORMAT Null
SELECT b, c FROM str_sort ORDER BY b, c, e, f FORMAT Null
SELECT a, d FROM str_sort ORDER BY c, d, e, f FORMAT Null
